## Events

| Event                   | Description                                              | Type               |
| ----------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------ |
| `ctaClicked`            | Triggers when the user clicks on CTA                     | `CustomEvent<any>` |
| `notificationDismissed` | Triggers when the user selects the delete / close button | `CustomEvent<any>` |

| Slot | Description |
| ---- | ----------- |
|      | Content     |


## Dependencies

### Depends on

- [cds-icon](../../elements/icon)
- [cds-button](../../elements/button)

### Graph
```mermaid
graph TD;
  cds-notification --> cds-icon
  cds-notification --> cds-button
  style cds-notification fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:4px
```
